name: protean

effect.scarlet-violet: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses. The type change takes place just before the move is used.
effect.the-teal-mask: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses. The type change takes place just before the move is used.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses. The type change takes place just before the move is used.

short_effect: Changes the bearer's type to match each move it uses.

flavor_text.scarlet-violet: Changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.
